about.details:
Incorporated in 2009, Seven Hills Beverages Ltd is engaged in the business of manufacturing packaged drinking water for Bisleri International Pvt Ltd.

They have dedicated Plant and Machinery for its manufacturing. It operates as "Co?packers" for "Bisleri" wherein it manufactures the bottles at its plant in order to avoid any possible contaminations and carry out the filling of purified water as well as final sealing and packaging. Company's product "packaged drinking water" is available in 5 pack sizes: 250 ml bottles, 500ml, 1 litre, 2 litre and 20 litre jars as per the production schedule given by Bisleri International Pvt. Ltd on monthly basis. The finished products are dispatched on daily basis. As per the mutual understanding; company produces Packaged Drinking Water for Nasik, Shirdi, Aurangabad & other nearby areas of Maharashtra.

Recently, SHBL has acquired 50.49% strategic stake in Palwe Pest Control Pvt. Ltd. ("PPCPL"), making it as its subsidiary company. PPCPL is a service provider, rendering pest control and other related services to corporate, societies and household. PPCPL has been in this business since more than 16 years and is a recognized brand in services such as General Pest Control Treatment, Birds Control Treatment, Landscaping services and Export Fumigation to Vessel and Container.

faqs.question: What is the Seven Hills Beverages IPO?
faqs.answer:
Seven Hills Beverages IPO is a SME IPO of 1600000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹4.16 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹26 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on August 18, 2017, and closes on August 23, 2017.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Seven Hills Beverages IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Seven Hills Beverages IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Seven Hills Beverages IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Seven Hills Beverages IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Seven Hills Beverages IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Seven Hills Beverages IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Seven Hills Beverages IPO opens on August 18, 2017 and closes on August 23, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Seven Hills Beverages IPO?
faqs.answer: Seven Hills Beverages IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,04,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Seven Hills Beverages IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Seven Hills Beverages IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Seven Hills Beverages IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Seven Hills Beverages IPO will be done on Tuesday, August 29, 2017, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Thursday, August 31, 2017. Check the Seven Hills Beverages IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Seven Hills Beverages IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Seven Hills Beverages IPO listing date is not yet announced. The tentative date of Seven Hills Beverages IPO listing is Friday, September 1, 2017.
